column1: Section:PL-Transportation Asset Inventory, Codes Tables (8 Reqs)

column4: Provide capability for system administrator to manage and update various codes tables which contain valid values for various  types of data stored in the system.
Provide a district number codes table.
Provide a sub station or other maintenance shop code table.
Provide a functional classification code table.
Provide a national highway system code table.
Provide the capability for various other user defined code tables.
